To play as the Legion select one of the.message: 選擇紅色的指揮官以使用'軍團'陣營

You won't be able to play without it, bu.message: 沒有它你就不能加入，但安裝很簡單!

It looks like you don't have the Legion.message: 看來你沒安裝'軍團'擴展模組用戶端

Select a blue Commander for MLA and a re.message: 藍色的指揮官是MLA(原版)，紅色的則是'軍團'

The Legion Expansion adds an entirely ne.message: '軍團'擴展模組加入一個全新的可用陣營
